page.title: 16HOUSES
page.content: There are 26 inhabited houses in this area.There are ruins of 3 houses,there were 2 others but these have been rebuilt. There are 2 homes used only for holidays. 13 houses are over 40 years old,8 between 20 and 40 years,1 between 10 and 20 while 4 are less than 10 years old. Most of the older houses were stone built as traditional crofts with 2 rooms downstairs and 2 upstairs. Extensions for bathrooms were put on later made of wood or cocrete block. The newer houses have been made from kits using a wooden frame and concrete blocks. All houses have a septic tank as we have no mains sewerage.17 have mains water,6 spring water,2 spring and river water and 1 has water from a well.
